meanings.definition: A teacher of the highest rank in a college or university.
meanings.sent1: The professor explained the complicated math problem to the students.
meanings.sent2: The professor received a prestigious award for his research in physics.
meanings.sent3: The professor's cat tried to teach the birds how to fly, but they just chirped back.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a classroom, and she, the professor of plants, taught each flower to bloom.
meanings.sent5: The professor's voice was a symphony of knowledge, captivating all who listened.

meanings.definition: A person who professes his or her sentiments, beliefs, etc.
meanings.sent1: The professor of positivity always had a smile on his face.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the professor of fashion, always setting new trends.
meanings.sent3: The professor of jokes had the whole class laughing with his witty puns.
meanings.sent4: His heart was the professor of love, teaching kindness and compassion to all.
meanings.sent5: The professor of adventure led the group on thrilling expeditions to unknown lands.
